summary: A unit test suite that verifies the OpenSearch Serverless client can perform all supported actions—creating, retrieving, listing, updating, and deleting collections and security policies, managing VPC endpoints, and applying resource tags—by exercising mocked AWS service calls.
business_intent: Ensure the client library reliably handles OpenSearch Serverless resource management, providing confidence that production code can manage collections, security policies, networking, and tagging without errors.
